item.title: 2022 BMW S 1000 R M Series
item.description:
Engine Type: Four-cylinder four-stroke in-line engine
Displacement: 999 cc
Bore and Stroke: 80 mm x 49.7 mm
Cooling: Liquid
Compression Ratio: 12.5 : 1
Transmission: Synchromesh six-speed gearbox, built into engine housing
Final Drive: Chain 525 17/45
Front Suspension: Upside-down telescopic fork with a diameter of 1.8 in., spring preload and adjustable rebound and compression stage
Rear Suspension: Aluminum swingarm, central shock absorber, adjustable rebound and compression damping and adjustable spring preload
Front Brakes: Twin-disc brake with a diameter of 12.6 in., four-piston fixed caliper
Rear Brakes: Single disc brake with a diameter of 8.7 in., one-piston floating caliper
Front Tire: 120/70 ZR 17
Wheelbase: 57.0 in.
Seat Height: 32.7 in. (OE seat low: 31.9 in., OE seat high: 33.5 in.)
Fuel Capacity: 4.4 gal.
Dry Weight: Curb Weight: 438.7 lb. (with M Package including M Carbon Wheels: 427.7 lb.)

item.title: 2021 Honda NC750 X ABS
item.description:
Engine Type: Four-stroke 55º parallel-twin
Displacement: 745cc
Bore and Stroke: 77mm x 80mm
Cooling: Liquid
Compression Ratio: 10.7:1
Fuel System: PGM-FI electronic fuel injection (Throttle By Wire)
Ignition: Full transistorized ignition
Transmission: Six-speed Manual
Final Drive: #520 Chain; 16T/43T
Front Suspension: 41mm Showa telescopic fork;.4.7 in. of travel
Rear Suspension: Pro-Link® w/ single shock; 4.7 in. of travel
Front Brakes: Single 320mm disc w/ hydraulic caliper; 2-channel ABS
Rear Brakes: Single 240mm disc w/ hydraulic caliper; 2-channel ABS
Front Tire: 120/70ZR-17 radial
Rear Tire: 160/60ZR-17 radial

Seat Height: 31.6 in.
Rake: 27.0 deg.
Trail: 4.3 in.
Fuel Capacity: 3.8 gal.
Dry Weight: Curb Weight: 472 lb.
Colors: Grand Prix Red
